subject_labels: Implement IRSA (IAM Roles for Service Accounts) for pod-level permissions
Configure OIDC provider for external authentication integration
Create separate node groups for GPU workloads using g4dn instances
Deploy cluster across exactly 3 availability zones
Implement pod security standards with restricted baseline
Use EKS version 1.28 or higher with IPv6 enabled
Set up AWS Load Balancer Controller as a managed add-on
Use AWS KMS for envelope encryption of Kubernetes secrets
Enable cluster autoscaler with tagging strategy for node groups
Node groups must use Bottlerocket AMI for enhanced security
author: mayanksethi-turing
